meta.description: Metadata is a JSON object used to store additional information about the slice

wp:post_type.title: WordPress post type
wp:post_type.description:
The type of the WordPress post.
Ccontent related post types are 'post' and 'page'.
If not declared, type 'post' will be assumed.

wp:post_name.title: WordPress post slug
wp:post_name.description: Used to generate the permalink. If not given, the sanitized post title will be used instead.

wp:post_parent.title: WordPress post parent id
wp:post_parent.description:
The WordPress post id of the parent post.
 If not given, the post will be created as a top level post.
